name: The Hardest Stacking Game Ever
description:
Literally what the title suggests. In this endless, calm and intense stacking game, calculate very carefully, as you'll have to catapult your whole stack onto new parts on and on to progress. The taller the stack gets, the more unstable its gravity center becomes, and the easier it gets to make it fall on its launch.

How high can you get?

 

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse drag to launch your stack.
  • R key to restart.
